org.araneaframework.uilib.support
Class FileInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.support.FileInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FileInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This file represents a file info received from a FileUploadControl. Besides common file attributes (name, original name, size and type) this class also provides a readFileContent() method, which allows to read the file content as a byte[]

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:

readFileContent

public byte[] readFileContent()
